name: Lord of the Beer
description:
Defend your barrel of beer against green skins. Buy traps and try to exterminate monsters!

This game was developed for the #LOWREZJAM 2017. The goal was to respect a resolution of 64x64 pixels.



[HOW-TO play]

[Credits]

Game developed by the Blackbones Team - Karis, Majaaax and oldteen
